page.title: 06Attitudes
page.content: The questionaire asked if people liked living in Blackford. The responses are tabulated below: ______________________________________ Male Female Total ______________________________________ Yes No Yes No Yes No -------------------------------------- 0- 9 1 1 5 0 6 1 10-19 8 4 7 4 15 8 20-29 8 0 10 2 18 2 30-39 10 2 12 1 22 3 40-49 10 0 8 1 18 1 50-59 11 1 10 1 21 1 60-69 7 0 8 1 15 1 70-79 4 0 9 1 13 1 80-89 3 0 2 0 5 0 ______________________________________ Total % liked living in Blackford=86.4 Total % disliked living in B/ford=13.6 NB of the 10-19 group 33% disliked living in Blackford.
